MuladdMacro.jl

  • Readme
  • Docstrings
    • Docstrings
    Docstrings
    MuladdMacro.@muladd — Macro.
    @muladd

    Convert every combination of addition/subtraction and multiplication to a call of muladd.

    If both of the involved operators are dotted, muladd is applied as a dot call. The order of summation might be changed.

    MuladdMacro.MuladdMacro
    MuladdMacro.args — Function.
    args(ex)

    Return arguments of function call in ex.

    MuladdMacro.eval
    MuladdMacro.include
    MuladdMacro.iscall — Function.
    iscall(ex, op)

    Determine whether ex is a call of operation op with at least two arguments.

    MuladdMacro.isdotcall — Function.
    isdotcall(ex)

    Determine whether ex is a dot call.

    isdotcall(ex, op)

    Determine whether ex is a dot call of operation op with at least two arguments.

    MuladdMacro.ismul — Function.
    ismul(ex, dot::Bool)

    Determine whether expression ex is a multiplication that is dotted if dot is true and not dotted otherwise.

    MuladdMacro.issub — Function.
    issub(ex)

    Determine whether ex is a subtraction.

    MuladdMacro.issum — Function.
    issum(ex)

    Determine whether ex is a sum.

    MuladdMacro.newargs — Function.
    newargs(ex, args)

    Create new expression of function call ex with arguments args.

    Unary function calls are not considered, i.e. if only one function argument is provided it is returned.

    MuladdMacro.newmuladd — Function.
    newmuladd(x, y, z, dot::Bool)

    Return expression (muladd).(x, y, z) if dot is true and muladd(x, y, z) otherwise.

    MuladdMacro.splitargs — Function.
    splitargs(ex)

    Split arguments of function call ex before last argument and combine first arguments to one expression if possible.

    MuladdMacro.sub_to_muladd — Function.
    sub_to_muladd(ex)

    Replace subtraction ex by muladd if possible.

    MuladdMacro.sum_to_muladd — Function.
    sum_to_muladd(ex)

    Replace sum ex by sequence of muladd if possible. Hereby the order of summation might be changed.

    MuladdMacro.to_muladd — Function.
    to_muladd(ex)

    Convert every combination of addition/subtraction and multiplication in expression ex to a call of muladd.

    If both of the involved operators are dotted, muladd is applied as a dot call The order of summation might be changed.
